name: Chip Conley
overview:
Chip Conley is the Head Of Global Hospitality at Airbnb. He is also the Board Director of Altius Education Inc., an author, and Founder of Joie de Vivre.
In 1987, Chip Conley started his own hospitality company, Joie de Vivre (JDV), and, as CEO for two dozen years, grew it into the second largest boutique hotel company in the United States.
